article.title: Fenton Assigned to Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff

tags.tag: Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff G-3/5/7

article.text: Col. Bryan P. Fenton, USA, has been selected for the rank of brigadier general and assigned as deputy director of strategy, plans and policy, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-3/5/7, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.
